data.eml:eml: A new species of glass-perch from Belitung Island, Indonesia (Teleostei: Ambassidae: Gymnochanda)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Heok Hui, Lim, Kelvin K. P. (2011): A new species of glass-perch from Belitung Island, Indonesia (Teleostei: Ambassidae: Gymnochanda). Zootaxa 3085: 55-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206507
